Clear = _SL.CommonColors.White, FC = _SL.CommonColors.W3, FEC = _SL.CommonColors.W2, Quad = _SL.CommonColors.W1, Quint = '#B462B2', } for i, af in ipairs(SCREENMAN'ListScoreRowItems':GetChildren()) do af'SongTitle':settext'[7] Disco Pop':x(-195) for i, scores in ipairs(af:GetChildren()) do if scores:GetName() == 'StepsScore' then local idx = math.random(1, #names) local entry = names[idx] scores:hidden(0) :maxwidth(100) :zoom(0.7) :x((i - 1) * 80 - 300) :settext(entry[1] .. '\n' .. entry[2]) :diffuse(_SL.HexToRGB(cleartocolormap[entry[3]])) :ztestmode'writeonpass' :shadowlength(0) table.remove(names, idx) end end end end
